definition[0]: something that helps a process to develop more quickly or more strongly
example[0]: Tax cuts provided the stimulus which the slow economy needed.
example[1]: The discovery of oil acted as a stimulus to industrial development.
definition[1]: something that makes someone or something move or react
example[2]: At this age, the infant begins to react more to visual stimuli.
definition[2]: something that helps a process to develop more quickly or strongly
example[3]: The discovery of oil acted as a stimulus to the local economy.
